1.content: i know that everyone hates choice chapter but first we have to decide a few things. are you...
1.title: where it all begins

11.content:
okay so where do you stand, who exactly hired you it may be important.












choice one: you were hire by an activist group, they were labeled as not the most reliable, or sane, people in the world but that only meant that you could squeeze even more money out of them. the mission is to scare away the dig team, or just "Get rid of them." any way possible. (in this story line you don't know nor do you care what is in this tomb just as long as you get paid, the giantess is HUGE surprise to him and the dig team.)

choice two: An activist group (yeah i'm going to be consistent) has heard that whatever is in that tomb is a WMD that the government wants it's hands on. you expect a large amount of resistance on your way to the main attraction. (In this story line you are expecting something but not along these lines.)
11.title: a man

info.brief_description: basically while on a job a bounty hunter discovers a giantess, you determine what type.
info.description:
Okay so this is my first interactive, hoping to get somewhere with it.

let's start off with the rules

no toilet

no insertion (not that type of story)

when it comes to swearing i'm fine with it as long as you don't go overboard (every other sentence) if you're not going to do this then just censor it.

not looking for bbw

other those things just have decent grammar.

oh and don't super short chapters, please.

story

the main character is a bounty hunter/ hired gun/ "enthusiastic activist" (you get the gist) who is sent into some ruins, he/she is being paid handsomely to go scare away a government dig team, but as we all know that can never go well. after a certain events he/she is stuck in a gts story, and as a writer its your job to figure out what the hell happens to 'em

have field day.
